com.googlecode.aluminumproject.cli

Class PropertyEffect<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.aluminumproject.cli.PropertyEffect<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the property that will be set
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    OptionEffect<Object>

    public class PropertyEffect<T>
extends Object
implements OptionEffect<Object>
    An option effect that will set a property on a command.
